original_text: And I will turn you about and drive you forward, and bring you up from the uttermost parts of the north, and lead you against the mountains of Israel.
korean_text: 너를 돌이켜서 이끌고 북쪽 끝에서부터 나와서 이스라엘 산 위에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And I will turn you about
and bring you up from the uttermost parts of the north
sentences.korean_translation: 북쪽 가장 먼 곳에서 너를 이끌어 올리겠다

sentences.original_text: and lead you against the mountains of Israel
